channel.title: oil on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in oil on PepsFeeder

item.title: Oil falls below 60 dollars
item.description: The coronavirus is weighing on the tourism and transportation sectors, where restrictions on regional flights continue to expand. In the aftermath, the European stock markets opened sharply lower.

item.title: Oil contracts in euros Russia continues to get rid of the dominance of the dollar
item.description: Russia’s biggest oil company, Igor Sechin, has shifted completely to using the euro in its contracts instead of the dollar, a move aimed at protecting its dealings from US sanctions, Rosneft’s chief executive said.
